answers.answer: Hi and thanks for using the forum.According to the American Diabetes Association, eating a lot of sugar does not cause diabetes.  Type 1 diabetes is caused by genetics, Type 2 diabetes is caused by genetics and lifestyle.  Being overweight will increase your risk of developing diabetes.  A diet high in calories (whether those calories are from sugar or from fat) can lead to you being overweight which is one of the risk factors for diabetes.  I hope this answers your question.Bridget
